ygData.subject: RE: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: did you ever try to use it? it was the level 12 enchanter charm spell that necros got at 24. that spell couldnt be used to charm any MOB over level 25. if you
ygData.messageBody:
did you ever try to use it? it was the level 12 enchanter charm spell that
necros got at 24. that spell couldnt be used to charm any MOB over level
25. if you cast the spell on a mob over 25, you got a message saying you
cant do it with this spell. by the time you got the spell at 24, it's
useless considering the other spells you got.

and i get sick of necros complaining about how they get resisted just like
everyone else now. life tap gets resisted now. good. necros were too
powerful with life tap almost always sticking and being able to kite. now
they get resisted just like wizzies and mages. i've played all 4, and even
NOW my enchanter STILL gets resisted more.

At 03:23 PM 11/18/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Jeremy Cobb <jeremy@...>
>
>Why was the charm spell useless for Necro's?∩┐╜ it worked the same as the
>enchanters, right?∩┐╜ Necro's over the last couple months have gotten hammered
>big time.∩┐╜ The charm and fear nerf changes nothing in non PVP∩┐╜situations
>(which probably counts for 95% of the time).∩┐╜ My necro would be very happy
>if his DOT's worked corectly in non PVP, or his life suck, or his Pet, or
>Feign Death.∩┐╜ Be thankful.
>∩┐╜
>∩┐╜
>Foladenn Darkinmore- Necromancer, Rodcet Nife
>Denina- Enchanter, Rodcet Nife
